ComicInfo.Title: Too Late for Love; The Wrong Road; Empty Heart; Untamed Love
ComicInfo.Summary:
Too Late for Love: Lila tries to break up her boss's marriage.
The Wrong Road: Kathy gives up her small-town life to be a model in the city and loses her fiance Bart in the process.
Empty Heart: Elaine doesn't understand why her co-star in a play acts so cold and distant during the romantic scenes.
Untamed Love: While on safari, Mona learns that she loves another man more than her fiance.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-16 19:52:39. [Issue ID 146135]
